name: Skulla Rulla
description:
You are a lone skull in a large cemetery. You can kick yourself from grave to grave by sheer force of will. You are searching for a sign. Specifically, a sign with a picture of a skull on it.

This little game was created using free assets as a part of an application process for an unrelated game that is currently in development. The art is provided by https://www.gameart2d.com, while the lovely instrumental piano cover of Spooky Scary Skeletons comes from Myuu (https://soundcloud.com/myuu).

Please enjoy, and let me know what you think! As ever, I'll probably come back and add a few things from time to time, so check back again later.
